name: Hanoi free city tour with local
description:
I know that all travellers when they visit a country, it will be better if you can explore this place with a local who can guide you to highlight destinations or try special cuisine. I am here to do it. I will not only be with you discover Hanoi's history but also help you know more about our culture, lifestyle, try Vietnamese cuisine in local places, etc which you might not see in any books. Moreover i can give you some recommendations for your trip in Vietnam or more things which you're confused here.
I love meeting travellers from all around the world but i am sorry that i just can speak English so my tour will be English speaking tour.
